div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirden tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijto
xiij die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie apud Duncanus
Ranison' est filius ac heres propinquor et legittimus quondam Alexander Rameson'
patris suj

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that
next cumis to george smicht to gyff in the ayrschip that
he clames of thomas lammynton' in bill In the name
of Johne Smyth his sone and ayr to vmquhile William
lammynton' his Eme and ordanit the saide thomas to comper
the said' day for ministracioun of Justice

The saide day William Ranisone tuk to preyve that
he hed' gevin to patry Richerdsone the litill Siluer'
knicht that he borrouit fra thomas meldrum this day
aucht dais befor the aldirman and balyeis

The said' day Dany Colp Renuncit george Smyth and Johne
Smyth his Sone

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis continevit the Action' debatabil'
betuix Jonet traill and the Sistiris of Johne Westland' anent
the gudis of Airschip quhile monunday the xxiiij day of Januar'
Instant in siclik force and effect as It is now In hoip of concord

Eodem die Willelmus king allutarius amerciatur per confessionem lingu
proprie quia propter occupacionem iniustam libertatis burgi vtens
arte allutoria et cetera cum non fuit burgensis nichil licenciatus per prepositum
seu decanos gilde cum emendabit ut Jura soluit

Eodem die Johannes Symmer' georgius smitht et alexander Ramsay allutarij
amerciantur quibus pro se per confessionem lingue proprie pro iniuste
occupacione libertatis burgi ut supra et Cuj emendabunt ut Rege Jure a volunt

Eodem die Willelmus bremar Johannes mar' scissor gener tulibo' Johannes
Srathachin scissor gilbertus andirson scissor Willelmus skene scissor
Willelmus Wobstar et Dauid Symsone textor Amerciantur pro
iniusta Occupacione libertatis burgi ut Supra et cetera

the saide day the borghe' fundin apone thome Ridall be alexander
annand' and his procuratouris for the wranguys haldin fra him of ane
barrell of tar' is continevit with consent of party to monunday the
xxiiij day of Januar' Instant In sicklik forme and effect as Is standis
now

The saide da the aldirman and balyeis contineweit the actione
persewit be Dauy Colp Agannis thomas lammyntone Anent the
gudis pertening and follouit be the saide Dauy throw deces' of vmquhile
Johne huchonsone eftir the tenor' of our Soueran lordis gyft grantit
to him tharapon'

The said' day thomas meldrum was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Johne Cullan forspekar for the byng and berkin of his hidys vthir
wais than the law leyfis for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of
the court and to Amend' as law will et cetera and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide William Ranison' was conuict' be the saide assis' Johne
Cullan forspekar for the bying and berkin of hidis wthirwais than the
law leyfis for the quhilkis he wais in Amerciament of the court and Amend'
as law wil and forber' in tym' to Cum

The said' day Androw michelson' was conuict' be the said' assis' Johne
Cullane forspekar for the bying and berking' of hidis vthirwais than the
law leyvis for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day Alexander Ranison conuictis be the saide assis' for bying'
and barking' of hidis vthirwais than the law leyfis for the quhilkis he
was in Ane amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' day Androw beltmakar conuict be the saide assis' for byng and
berking hidis vthirwais than the law leyvis et cetera for the quhilkis
he was in Ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

The saide day thome meldrum William Ranison Androw michelson'
and Alexander Ranison war conuikit be the saide Suorne assis' Johne
Cullan forspekar for the selling derrar' of thar stuff and werk tile strangearis and
vteuthe folkis than to thar' callandis Agen common' o ordinance
and the saide thomas for sending of hidis in flandris and bertoring' with franchmen
quhilkis In continent to the aldirman and counsale becaus' the Actioun' was

The said' day for the commone weile ande profit' of the tone It was
statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis Consale and diuers' of the communite
present for' the tyme that ale the cordonaris within the saide burghe sulde
mak gude and Sufficient werk and Stuff according to thar' Craft
and Sele the sammyn one siclik price as was and has bene tymes
bigan and nay derrar' Ande In continent the aldirman and balyeis In the
tovnis nayme chargit and ordanit ale the said' Craftismen tile
Obserue and kepe the said' statut and common ordinance vndir al
pane and charg that eftir of law and Reson' micht follow and vndir the
pane of brekin of common' ordinance

The saide the baillies assignit mononday that nixt cumis to georg sowter
tile ansuer to the borght strekit one him be Jamis liell in the name' and
behalf of Dauid tailyeour to freith and Releif him of xj s' and viij d'
d' at the handis of ser Johnn' stirueling

The said' day It was sufficientlie preuit befor the ballieis that the Comptour'
follouit befor this ballieis be Dany tailyour procuratoris to the ayris
of Johne Westland' as ayrschip to thame arrestit in Dany themannis
handis was lent to vmquhile the said' Johne be Dany mar' and
was his the said' Dauid

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
Januarij anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis decernit and ordanit tile
obey the the Instrument vndir the Signe and subscripcioun of vmquhile
sere Robert leis nor' and the Sele of Androw Cullan balye Anent the
Diuision' of the lande of vmquhile gilbert leche and ale pontis
contenit in It Anent the pament of the annuell' vnto the tyme
thar' beis vthir Richtis schewin to thame

The said day georg sowter lauchfully callit and nocht Comperit
tile haue ansuerit to the borght strekit on him be Dauid liell in the
name and behalf of Dauid tailyeour ffor the quhilkis the baillies chargit
William scrimgeour officiar to tak ane stres' of the said georg and lat It
to borght' gif It be askit and warne the said georg to friday that nixt
cumis till ansuer to the said borght a

The said' day the baillies assignit fryday that nixt cumis to thomas
Narne till ansuer to the borght strekit one him be mathow branche
for the wrangwis' withhalding fra him of thre stane Irne and a half
and ordanit the said thomas to bring his preffis that day as he wald
be seruit

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die Januarij anno quo supra

the saide day William Ranison' falyet in his preyve of
the litill Siluer kniff that he preuit tuk to preywe this
day he hed' gevin to patry Richerdsone for the quhilkis
he was in Ane amerciament of the court and aw to Restoir' the saide
knicht to the saide patry et cetera

The said day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin
for dome that the borght strekit be patrick Reid in the handis of gilbert
prestone officiar in the name' and behalf of Johnne kirkland that
James berwy aucht to be ane preiff was of awaill In the
actioun' allegeit be the said patrik anent the gudis that the said Johne
Intromettit witht pertening to the said Johne kirkland and the
Recovntour maid be the said' Johne andirsoun' in contrar the said'
borght was of nayne awaill for the quhilkis the said Johnn'
was inamerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day patrik adamson' deponit be his aitht that Johnn'
andersoun' get byrne the elding that was in the hous' that
Johnn' kirkland' duelt In

The said day James berwy deponit be his aitht that he
saw elding in Johne' andirsonnis hous' that Johne' kirkland'
duelt In pertening to the said' Johne kirkland wortht
xvj s' euery carttill was wortht iij d' And deponis
that he saw ane almery' quhilk was castin out be the
said Johne'

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law
and It was gevin for dome that Jhone' andersoun'
sall pay to Johne' kirkland' xvj s' for his elding
and samony Cartfull as the said Johne' andersoun'
caus' to be deliuerit to the said Johne kirkland that
salbe allowit iij d' of euery cartfull of the said'
Johne kirklandis elding and he sall mak the almery
als gud as It was ffor the quhilkis the said Johne'
was inamerciament of the court

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxiiij die Januarij Anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne of mar' grantit him aving to
William Wormet xxj s' of money to be pait within
of law

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Johne retre forspekar that the borghe' fundin be Jonhne
thomsone one Johne murray for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of ane Siluer spvne is continevit to friday
that nixt cumis and ordanit to warne Johne mvnk to comper
the said' day and to bring the saide Siluer spvne with him
the saide day and Jonhne murray to bring his Richtis
and witnes with him as he wile tyne and wyn' with

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo octauo die Januarij quo Supra

the said day Robert blinsele forspekar for alexander hay opinly
exponit and schew In presence of the aldirman and balyeis that diuers'
evile disposit personis hed' murmvrit the said Alexander allegeand'
that he suld' mysgide him tile his nichtbouris and Reulit him nocht as
ane nichtbour' suld' do ymang his fallouis merchandis and nychtbouris
to the darigacioun' of his honour' and to his gret dampnage
and skath considering that he he has gidit him in ale his doingis as
efferis him Requireing opinly in the court and In the consalhous'
at the assis gif ony persone or personis war complanteous' one him
in ony thingis Offering' him redy tile vndirly ane declaracioun'
of ane assis' furthtwith of the nichtbouris of the tone Ande nayn'
complenyet Apone the saide Alexander

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Androw nachtj sal restoir' the pot to William
Smitht that he borouit fra him in the tyme of the kingis hir' being
or ellis pay the price of the saide pott

The saide day Wat Allansone conuikit be ane Suorne assis William
blindsele forspekar for brekin of ewill pace Stuff gilbert tulidef conuikit
for bakin of ewill Stuff

Eodem die Johannes gray conuictus fuit pro perturbacio thome stot Idem thomas
conuictus fuit pro perturbacio dicti Johannis Idem Johannes conuictus fuit pro perturbacio Duncanj
ros' et Idem Duncanus conuictus pro perturbacio prefati Johannis et quilibet alteri emen
dabit ut iura volunt

The saide day Robert blinsele come Souerte to pay Jonhne murray vij s'
amd iiij d' for Jonhne mvnk be Witsonday that next cumis and the saide
Jonhne oblist him be his hande vphaldin to freithe the saide Robert of the
saide money

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame Wormet et Richerd' Waus come Souerte
to the aldirman and ballieis to Entir thome Athoill and Robert athole
his sone one friday befor thame that next cumis within the tolbutht

Johannes leslie de Warderis Alexander Rede gilbertus menyes Johannes
Colisone Duncanus colison' thomas Waus Willelmus Wormet Andreas
Waus Duncanus crak patricius Rede patricius leslie Alexander
mathesone and georgius bysset burgenses dicti burgi Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Johannes lundoris pater Auus Agnetis lundoris
latricis presencium obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
Et quod dicta Agnes est legittima Agnes est et propinquor heres
dicti quondam Johannis auj suj Et quod est legittime etatis Ceteri puncti
breuis patent in se quia Agnes non peciit terras neque
annuos Redditij

Curia balliuorum burgi per tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die februarij
Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit the xviij day of
this Instant monetht of februar' to thomas Ridall and cristian
lilburne his Spous to Ansuer' to the bill of complant gevin
one thame be the douchtir of vmquhile William buchan and hir'
in tutouris and to bring with tham the Instrument Richtis and Documentis quhilkis
thai haue and will vys Anent the hous' that thai Inhabitis

Eodem die thomas fyf fecit constitut creauit et Nominauit Andream
fyf filium suum procuratorem legittimum in causa clamei' dominj abbatis et conuentus
de arbrothoc penes summam xlv li' sibi ipsum Ac in omnibus aliis
causis Actionibus et querelis ipsum concernens opponendum defendendum
Agendum respondendum promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausis
necessariis et Oportuniis in vberiore forma procuratorij

The saide day the balyeis ordanit the Copy of the bill
of clame of airschip gevin in be Agnes lundoris
be deliuerit to Dauy brois' and his wif one thar expens'
Ande assignit friday that nixt cumis to the saide
Dauy and his wif to Ansuer' to the said' Agnes
In the premiss'

The said Is was deliuerit be ane suorne assis patrik
Red forspekar that William Walcar sal preve sufficiently
one mononday that nixt cumis that Johne glenny is his
feit seruand and failyeing tharof the said Johne glenny sall
mak seruice to Robert Walcar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vijo
februarij

the saide day It was fundin and preuit that Jonhne glenny
is feit seruand' to Williame Walcar'

Eodem die Johannes pillor conuictus per assisam pro perturbacio Willelmi Walcar
eiusdem Willelmus amerciatur pro perturbacio dicti Johannis et quodlibet alteri emendabit ut Jura
volunt

James be the grace of god king of Scottis To the alderman and baillies of our
burght of Aberdene' greting fforsamekle' as It is humulie menit and schewin to ws
that quhen ony taxt or contribucioun' Is Rasit throw ale our burrowis that our
said burgh' of Aberdene' is nocht stentit nor pait neuire in tymes bigane bot the x
part of the haill taxt put one our said burrowis eftir the auld Rit and consuetud'
tharof And now we haue ordanit the Some' of jM merkis and jC crownis to
be Rasit and' Inbrocht of our saidez' burrowis to the furnissing of our honorable'
ambassatouris now being in Ingland forour mariag' as our lettres and extent
Roll direct' tharapone proportis of the quhilk haile taxt and sowme' of jM
merkis and jC crownis forsaid the x part tharof extendis to the Sowme' of jC
merkis and x crownis quhilk yhe haue pait for your part of the said taxt
to ane Reuerend' fadir in god and our traist consalour Androu postulat
of murray as his acquittance gevin you tharapon' proportis as Is allegeit
Neuirtheles' now laitly Dauid tempilman messinger and schir Williame
Willek Wilkesoun' chaplane and seruitour to our louit patrik Blacatar of
Tulealloun' knicht has cumin with our lettres chargeing you to mak pament
to thame as our collectouris to our saidez' ambassatouris the soume of jC
li for your part of the said taxt contrar the said consuetud' of our burrowis
or ellis to haue put yow to our horne' and sesit in our handis the fredomes
of our saide burgh' of abirdene as wes elikwis' allegeit Our will
Is herfor and we charg' youe stratlie and commandis that in continent
thir our lettres that gif your part of the said taxt be vnpait that ye mak
samyn' to be pait without delay to the collectouris tharof samekle'
as It extendis eftir the wse and consuetud of our said burgh' and siclik as
has bene vsit in tymes bigane anentis our taxt And namar be Rasit
of our said' burgh' of the quhilk we discharg' youe and ale vthiris our
officiaris in tyme cuming be thir our lettres haldand thame for your warent
in tyme cuming gevin vndir out signet at Edinburgh' the xj day of
Januar' and of our Regnne the xiiij yer
Ex deliberacione dominorum Consilij
Douglace
